thread.section_title: Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Friendly service
thread.title_full: Friendly service - Review of Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: William M
title: Friendly service
text:
Well appointed hotel in a great position for doing the tourist thing in Paris.
Any remaining idea that the citizens of Paris are anything less than friendly are put to bed by the staff of this hotel. They were unfailingly helpful and friendly .
Anyone needing a reasonable price hotel in Paris should put this one to the top of their list.
